Why?

if it's just sex to you, why do you hold my face in your hands and stare into my eyes? why do you kiss me so slowly and deliberately? Why do you hold me for so long and gently kiss my forehead when I leave? If it's just sex to me, why do I melt when you smile at me?

YUP

So yea im in skool rite now in my Emerging Energy class getting my ass bitched at for not payin attention to the shit thats going on... all we are doing are presenting powerpoints....GAY!! i dont even know wat the fuck this class is about... im guessing its about new forms of energy,, u know like energy thats emerging in to the public like wind turbines...n water energy... n yea...idk...im just talkin about nothin...thats how bored i am... n they blocked all the other sites like Facebook...n that really pisses me off cuz thats all i want to go on rite now...u know how many ppl i could be talking to if i could be on facebook? GOD DAMN like half the skool n yea i dont go to a big skool...everyone knows about everyone...but shit its still alot of ppl n it would be funner to talk to them than to write this stupid ass blog or wat the fuck ever it is....oh by the way i like to swear,,,haha its like tourettes or someshit...oh well who cares...if u dont like it... you can go suck a big one for all i care...BITCHES!!! oh shit i gotta go the teacher is comin..LATER!!

untitled poem on rape

broken into pieces and torn all apart.
there is little remains left of my broken heart.
you did this to me.
you're the one who made me cry.
and you made it worse when you chose to lie.
with all the chains and metal hangers between all of your beatings.
you left me with bruises, thinking of excuses of what had happened the night before.
of when you and him would lock me in a closet and call me a little whore.
night, after night, you would keep coming back for more.
and finally, one day, i got the courage to stand up for myself.
i told the school nurse and the principal, and it all became more of hell.
nobody believed me when i tried to tell.
i would come home crying and you kept reminding me of dying, of the promise you made if i told on you.
you said you would kill me if i told anyone.
i stood up no matter what you told me.
i would go to my friends house and her mom would just hold me.
finally, i got you, i got you away from me.
no more bruises, no more thinking of excuses.
and look at the woman i have become.
i dont let you get to me or bring me down.
this is how you changed me, how you turned my life around.
thank you for doing what you have done because i have more respect than ever before and i hope you had your fun.
because this time, I WON!!!!

Girl Poem

I shave my legs,
I sit down to pee.
I can justify any shopping spree.
Don't go to a barber, but a beauty salon.
Can get a massage without a hard-on
I can balance the checkbook,
Can pump my own gas.
Can talk to my friends about the size of my ass.
My beauty's a masterpiece and yes, it takes long.
At least I can admit to others when I'm wrong.
I don't drive in circles, at any cost.
And I don't have a problem admitting I'm lost.
I never forget an important date.
You just gotta deal with it, I'm usually late.
I don't watch movies with lots of gore.
Don't need instant replay to remember the score.
I won't lose my hair, I don't get jock itch.
And just cause I'm assertive, Don't call me a bitch.
Don't say to your friends, Oh yeah, I can get her.
In your dreams, my dear, I can do better!
Flowers are okay,
But jewelry's best.
Look at me you idiot..
Not at my chest!!!
I don't have a problem,
With Expressing my feelings.
I know when you're lying,
You look at the ceiling.
DON'T call me a GIRL ,
a BABE or a CHICK .
I am a WOMAN.
Get it?, you DICK!?!

WHEN A GUY.....

GIRL FACTS:

When a girl bumps into your arm
while walking she wants
you to hold her hand

When she wants a hug
she will just stand there

When u break a girls heart,
she still feels it when
u run into each other 3 years later

When a girl is quiet,
millions of things are running through her
mind.

When a girl is not arguing,
she is thinking deeply.

When a girl looks at you with eyes full of
questions,
she is wondering how long you will be
around.

When a girl answers, "I'm fine, " after a
few seconds,
she is not at all fine.

When a girl stares at you,
she is wondering why you are so
wonderful.

When a girl lays her head on your chest,
she is wishing for you to be hers forever.

When a girl says that she can't live
without you,
she has made up her mind that you are
her future.

When a girl says, "I miss you, "
no one in this world can miss you more
than that

When a girl is mean to you after a breakup
she wants you back, but she's
scared she'll get hurt and knows
you're gone forever

When a girl has broken up with you becuase you were a jerk, don't think its one of those "she wants me back" things, shes pretty much positive she doesn't want you back

Guy Facts:

When a guy calls you,
he wants to be with you

When a guy is quiet,
He's listening to you...

When a guy is not arguing,
He realizes he's wrong

When a guy says, "I'm fine, " after a few
minutes,
he means it

When a guy stares at you,
he wishes you would care about him and
wonders if you do

When you're laying your head on a guy's
chest,
he has the world

When a guy calls you everyday,
he is in love

When a (good) guy tells you he loves you,
he means it

When a guy says he can't live without you,
he's with you till your done

When a guy says, "I miss you, "
he misses you more than you could have
ever missed him or anything else

repost this in 10 minutes and your true
love will
call you

IF YOU'RE A GUY POST IT AS: "WHEN A GIRL..."

AND

IF YOU'RE A GIRL POST IT AS: "WHEN A GUY...."
